Name: Date Time Field
AntiForgery: enabled
Author: Sébastien Ros
Website: http://orcharddatetimefield.codeplex.com
Version: 1.0
OrchardVersion: 1.1
Description: The Date Time Field module introduces a new field with Date and Time management functionalities.
Features:
    Contrib.DateTimeField:
        Name: Date Time Field
        Description: Date and Time fields.
        Category: Fields
        Dependencies: Orchard.jQuery, Common, Settings
